title: The Medal of Honor that the recipient forbade from the Navy ball to criticize Obama?
subtitle: Dakota Meyer, who received the Medal of Honour, says that he was "invited" to attend the American Navy's birthday party in Afghanistan because he criticized Obama's administration.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Obama administration obtained the medal of honor Dakota Meyer of the 241st Christmas ball in the Navy in Kabul, Afghanistan, because he criticized the President.
